SEARCH
Package my_package

Class GameManager

java.lang.Object
my_package.GameManager
public class GameManager extends Object
Manages the game logic and state changes for a virtual pet. This class handles periodic updates of pet stats, state changes, and various pet activities.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    GameManager(Pet pet)
    Constructs a new GameManager with the specified pet.

    Method
    Description
    void

    Makes the pet exercise, increasing health but decreasing sleep and fullness.

    Starts the periodic gameplay loop that updates pet stats and states.

    Allows the pet to play, increasing happiness but decreasing sleep and fullness.
    void
    sleepPet()
    Puts the pet to sleep, restoring its sleep to maximum and increasing its score.
    void

  • Constructor Details

    • GameManager

      public GameManager(Pet pet)
      Constructs a new GameManager with the specified pet.
      Parameters:
      pet - The pet instance to manage

  • Method Details

    • sleepPet

      public void sleepPet()
      Puts the pet to sleep, restoring its sleep to maximum and increasing its score.

    • vetPet

      public void vetPet()
      Takes the pet to the vet, restoring its health to maximum. This action decreases the pet's score as a penalty.

    • playPet

      public void playPet()
      Allows the pet to play, increasing happiness but decreasing sleep and fullness. This action increases the pet's score.

    • exercisePet

      public void exercisePet()
      Makes the pet exercise, increasing health but decreasing sleep and fullness. This action increases the pet's score.

    • periodicGameplay

      public void periodicGameplay()
      Starts the periodic gameplay loop that updates pet stats and states. This method initializes a timer that runs every second to: - Update pet stats (sleep, happiness, fullness) - Handle special state effects (asleep, hungry, angry) - Manage state transitions based on pet conditions - Update the pet's score

    • stopPeriodicGameplay

      public void stopPeriodicGameplay()
      Stops the periodic gameplay loop by canceling the timer. This should be called when the game is being closed or paused.
